name: Totoro: Mei Is Missing (Hack)
description:
Hack of: Super Mario Bros. Released by: Cakewarden.

Mei has gone missing again and Totoro has to go on an adventure to find her. Totoro will encounter creatures during his journey that will try and stop him.
Totoro will go through 14 new levels during his adventure facing enemies inspired from My Neighbour Totoro and Spirited Away.
This hack alters the graphics, levels, and music of Super Mario Bros. to give a new take on an old classic.
